Naija News reports that Umahi, who is the chairman of the South-East Governors Forum, stated this after a virtual meeting with the five governors of the region at the government house, Abakaliki. item.description: The Boko haram terrorists leader, Abubakar Shekau, and a splinter group, Ansaru were on Wednesday sanctioned by the United Nations Security Council. Following the sanction, Boko haram leader, Shekau and Ansaru will be banned from international travel while their assets would be frozen under the UN al Qaeda sanctions list.

item.title: External Reserves Fall Below $40bn Mark
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria in a data released has revealed that the external reserves have fallen below the $40bn mark to the lowest point in over three months. item.title: Photo Of Storm Reporter Harnessed To A Building Has People Asking Questions

item.title: Does Nairobi Die in 'Money Heist'? Spoilers for Season 4 of the Series
item.description: Nairobi's Fate Revealed in 'Money Heist' Season 4 (SPOILER ALERT)By Anna QuintanaUpdated April 3 2020, 1:20 p.m. ET Source: TAMARA ARRANZ/NetflixSeason 3 of Money Heist (known in Spanish as La Casa de Papel) left fans with a major cliffhanger. Nairobi (Alba Flores) was shot in the chest by Spanish cop Alicia Sierra, who convinced her they had her son. As expected, fans were divided about whether Nairobi's fate would mirror her fallen heist conspirator Berlin, who was killed in the Season 2 finale, or if the eccentric counterfeiter would survive her grave injuries.

Now, a new report from Puck alleges that Bill has paid a $100,000 settlement to a female crew member from the film Being Mortal, which was suspended indefinitely due to complaints of Bill's misconduct.

item.title: Adele - Age, Family, Bio
Lauren Stamile - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Famous for her roles as Michelle Slater, Dani Pearce, and Nurse Rose on, respectively, NBC's Community, USA's Burn Notice, and ABC's Grey's Anatomy, this actress also appeared in episodes of Scrubs, Criminal Minds, and The Mentalist. Before Fame After studying theatre at Northwestern University in Illinois, she relocated to New York City. Trivia Her professional stage credits include productions of Lion in Winter and The Miser. item.title: Wike, G-5 Governors Return To Nigeria, Speak On PDP Chairmanship Position
item.description: Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike, has insisted that the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) national chairmanship position must come to the Southern part of the country. Naija News reports that the PDP national chairmanship position is currently occupied by Iyorchia Ayu, who hails from Benue State, in the North Central geopolitical zone of the country. Wike, however, insisted on Friday during the commissioning of a project in his state that a Southerner must occupy Ayu’s position.

item.title: Atiku Speaks On Picking Okonjo-Iweala As Running Mate
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar, has denied media reports that he is planning to pick the Director-General of the World Trade Organisation, Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, as his running mate. Several reports emerged over the weekend claiming that Atiku met with some members of the international community in Zurich, Switzerland as part of moves to pick Okonjo-Iweala as his Vice President. Apart from the former Minister of Finance, other names said to be considered for the vice-presidential slot are Governor Ifeanyi Okowa of Delta State; Governor Udom Emmanuel of Akwa Ibom State; a former Govermor of Imo State, Emeka Ihedioha and former Governor of Delta State, Emmanuel Uduaghan.

item.title: Bruce Grobbelaar - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Retired goalkeeper who played internationally for Rhodesia and Zimbabwe and played professionally from 1973 to 2007. Before Fame He was a skilled cricketer as a teenager and was even offered a baseball scholarship in the United States. Trivia He made 440 career appearances for Liverpool, where he played the bulk of his career. Family Life He grew up in Durban, South Africa. Associated With He played for manager Roy Evans on Liverpool.

item.title: Buhari's ministerial list: Live updates as Senate screens nominees (day 4)
item.description: The Senate on Wednesday, July 24, commenced the screening of the 43 ministerial nominees sent by President Muhammadu Buhari on Tuesday, July 24, for confirmation. So far the Senate has screened 31 of the 43 ministerial nominees. 10 of the nominees were screened on Wednesday, July 24, 14 screened on Thursday, July 25, while seven were screened on Friday, July 26. Some of the nominees already screened are Sen. Tayo Alasoadura (Ondo), Abubakar Aliyu (Yobe), Mustapha Shehuri (Borno), Retired Maj.

item.title: Mimi Faust - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Oluremi James, she is best known as a star on the VH1 reality series Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta. Before Fame At the age of 13, she was abandoned by her mother, Olaiya Odufunke, after her mother became a Scientologist.  Trivia She owned her own estate and commercial cleaning service called Keep It Clean, Inc. in Atlanta. Family Life She was born in Newport News, Virginia. She has a daughter named Eva.

item.title: Yahaya Bello In Attendance As INEC Presents Certificate Of Return To Ododo
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has presented Certificates of return to the Governor-Elect of Kogi State, Usman Ododo and his running mate, Joel Salifu. The certificates of return were presented at the INEC headquarters in Lokoja, the state capital, on Friday amid jubilation by a mammoth crowd of party supporters. Presenting the Certificates, the Kogi State Resident Electoral Commissioner (REC), Gabriel Longpet, said the presentation was part of the Commission’s mandate.

item.title: Bonez MC - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: German rapper and member of the rap crew known as 187 Street Gang. He's also collaborated jointly with member Gzuz on the album High & Hungry, which entered number nine on the German charts and subsequently the album High & Hungry 2, which debuted at number one. Before Fame He formed 187 Street Gang in 2006. Trivia He also enjoyed success as a solo artist with the album Convulsively Criminal, which debuted at 60 on the German charts.

item.title: Shiloh Jolie-Pitt - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known as the daughter of Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie. She was the first biological child born to the Hollywood stars.  Before Fame She was born in Swakopmund, Namibia. Trivia She had an uncredited role in the 2008 film The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, which starred her father. Family Life She is the granddaughter of Marcheline Bertrand, Academy Award-winner Jon Voight, Jane Etta Pitt and William Alvin Pitt. Her siblings are Maddox, Pax, Zahara, and twins Knox and Vivienne.

item.title: Why I Featured In Brotherhood Movie Basketmouth
item.description: Nigerian ace comedian, Bright Okpocha, better known as Basketmouth, has opened up on why he featured in the 2022 Nollywood movie, ‘Brotherhood’. Naija News reports that Basketmouth, in an interview with PUNCH, said he starred in the movie due to curiosity about what he could do in the movie scene. The comedian who played the role of ‘Shadow’, the head of a notorious robbery gang, also said he dyed his hair white to experiment with an idea.

item.title: Why South-East Must Obey Tuesday's Sit-at-home Order IPOB
item.description: The outlawed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) has given reasons why it declared another sit-at-home for September 14, 2021. Naija News recalls that the pro-Biafra group had declared a new sit-at-home to remember those allegedly killed in Afaraukwu, Abia State in 2017 by Nigerian soldiers who were searching for the group’s leader, Nnamdi Kanu. The pro-Biafra group accused soldiers of desecrating the traditional stool of Afaraikwu in 2017. In a statement on Monday, IPOB’s spokesman, Emma Powerful, said the Tuesday sit-at-home in the southeast remains sacrosanct.

item.title: Clive Standen - Age, Family, Bio

Trivia He has also done voice over work for the video games, Alien vs. Predator and Inversion. Family Life He married to his wife, Francesca, in 2007. The couple has three children.

item.title: Desmond Styles - Edad, Familia, Biografa
item.description: Acerca De Padre de la superestrella Harry Styles de One Direction, que se divorció de la madre de Harry cuando éste tenía 7 años de edad. Se mantuvo cerca de su hijo y su hija tras el divorcio. Antes de la Fama Trabajó como gerente de operaciones en el HFC Bank por cerca de 16 años. Curiosidades Trabaja como director de la empresa HS Consulting y anteriormente trabajó como Director de Ventas y Mercadeo de Quickdox Limited.

item.title: Michael Bolton - Age, Family, Bio

item.title: T.D. Jakes - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Pastor of The Potter House, a megachurch with 30,000 members, whose sermons are broadcast all over the world on numerous stations, including Trinity Broadcasting Network and Black Entertainment Television. Family Life He has five children, Sarah, Jermaine, Cora, Jamar and Thomas, with Serita Jakes, whom he married in 1981.

item.description: 'Bel-Air' is returning for Season 2 in February 2023. Before we step back into Will and Banks family's glamorous lives, take a look at the Season 1 recap. While many diehard fans of The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air rolled their eyes at a reimagined version of the Will Smith-led sitcom, Peacock’s Bel-Air quickly shut down the naysayers. The series amplified many of the 1990s show’s storylines with modern and dramatic points of view.

The popular Chinese game dev team behind successful free-to-play games has recently rebranded as HoYoverse in order to denote a new era of its entertainment services.

item.title: Khartoum: Sudan security forces fire teargas at protesters outside army headquarters
item.description: It was drama in Central Khartoum, Sudan, on Monday, April 8 after security forces lobbed teargas at protestors who had gathered outside the Defence Ministry. Protests against President Omar al-Bashir were gaining momentum when security forces in pickup trucks intervened as they extensively fired teargas at the protesting citizens. READ ALSO: New IG Hillary Mutyambai puts on notice corrupt police officers in first speech Citizens have been calling for the resignation of al-Bashir as they faulted the Head of State for the current dwindling economy in the country.

item.title: Minister Gives Update, Reveals When Npower Batch A And B Will Get Outstanding Stipends
item.description: Hajiya Sadiya Umar Farouq, the Minister of Humanitarian Affairs, Disaster Management, and Social Development has given an important update on the payment of outstanding stipends for exited Batch A and B beneficiaries of the Npower scheme. The Minister in a series of tweets via her Twitter account on Tuesday, 27th October explained that those with outstanding payments were affected by the platform migration from NIBSS to GIFMIS by the Office of Accountant General of the Federation in March 2020.

item.title: Portable Fumes At Concertgoers For Not Spraying Him Money During Performance In Germany
item.description: Nigerian singer, Habeeb Okikiola, popularly known as Portable, tackled concertgoers for not raining money on him during a concert in Germany. Naija News reports that the singer took to his Instagram page to share some of the moments from his music tour in Germany and other countries. In one of the videos, Potable, while performing, expressed displeasure at the concertgoers over the less financial motivation he was receiving. The ‘zazu’ crooner at some point started ranting and asking the audience if they think it was easy for him to come to Germany to perform.

item.title: Davidos Fall Re-Enters Billboard Hot 100 After Performing On Stage With Travis Scott
item.description: ‘Fall,’ a track by Nigerian Afrobeats artiste, Davido has re-entered the Billboard charts. He performed the song again at a Travis Scott concert in the U.S when the U.S rapper brought him on stage. The concert which was held on Saturday, 6th of August, 2022 saw fans go wild with excitement as Davido brought all the energy on stage. It is quite like him to do but fans have been saying his performance on Saturday was ‘out of this world.

item.title: Why 2024 Budget Was Increased By N1.2 Trillion
item.description: The House of Representatives has highlighted why it increased the 2024 budget by N1.2 trillion. Naija News reported earlier that the 10th Senate, under the leadership of Senator Godswill Akpabio, passed the 2024 appropriation bill. The budget was passed after its size was increased from N27.5 trillion, as proposed by President Bola Tinubu, to N28.7 trillion. The budget size was increased by N1.2 trillion, a development that has generated mixed reactions among concerned Nigerians.

item.title: Chiwetalu Agu Regains Freedom After 24 Hours In Army Custody
item.description: Veteran Nollywood Actor, Chiwetalu Agu has reportedly been released from the custody of the Nigerian Army in Enugu State. Popular actress, Chizzy Alichi, who made this known via her Instagram page on Friday, said Agu is safe and sound. She wrote: “Uncle Chinwetalu Agu has been released. He is safe and sound. All thanks to God and everyone that contributed one way or the other.” https://www.instagram.com/p/CUw5WEOIM4E/ Naija News recalls that on Thursday, Oct 7 Nigerian soldiers apprehended Agu at the Upper Iweka area of Anambra state for wearing a Biafran flag outfit.

item.title: Is Shane Dawson Ever Planning to Return to YouTube? What We Know
item.description: Shane Dawson Could Be Planning His Return to YouTube Right NowBy Brittany VincentUpdated Nov. 2 2020, 6:55 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesFollowing a massive bout of drama between YouTuber Shane Dawson and beauty guru Jeffree Star, it seemed as though the popular vlogger would never return to the platform. After a tell-all from beauty YouTuber Tati Westbrook all but ended Dawson and Star's time on social media for a few months, fans were left wondering what would be next for the pair.

item.title: Kenyan Lady Disgraced By Portable Breaks Silence
item.description: A Kenyan lady accused by street sensation, Habeeb Okikiola, popularly known as Portable of approaching him for a hookup has shed more light on the viral video. The lady identified as Peris Mumo disclosed that she reached out to the fast-rising singer and his friends for an interview for her YouTube channel. The singer in a viral video had made jest of the lady alongside his friends as he said he was not available for hookup.

item.title: This Is Why Some McDonald's Locations Look Like They're Retirement Homes
item.description: We all recognize the golden arches and every McDonald's more or less looks like the same, but these franchises are jarring customers' senses. If you watched The Founder, or just understand and appreciate successful large-scale business strategy, then you'll know that one of the reasons why fast-food giant McDonald's is so darn successful is because their restaurant experiences are pretty much identical worldwide. At least in theory. Sure, the food might be done a bit better in some locations as opposed to others; the one on Clay Street, in Vicksburg Mississippi is the best I've ever eaten at, hands down.

item.title: Umahi Breaks Silence On Disrupted 'One Million March' For Peter Obi In Ebonyi
item.description: An aide to Governor, David Umahi has denied the involvement of the state government in disrupting the solidarity rally that was supposed to hold for the Labour Party presidential candidate, Peter Obi, in Abakaliki, Ebonyi State, on Saturday. Naija News had earlier reports that Ebonyi State Police Command fired tear gas at a crowd assembled to embark on a one million march rally for the Labour Party (LP), presidential candidate Peter Obi, at the Pastoral Centre, Abakaliki.

item.title: 2023: Jonathan Gives Presidency Condition To Join APC
item.description: The reported plan to bring in former President Goodluck Jonathan as the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress seems not to be ending anytime soon. The focus of the ruling party will now turn to searching for a presidential candidate after its successful national convention on Saturday. With the emergence of Abdullahi Adamu as the National Chairman of the party there are high probabilities that the APC might zone its presidential ticket to the South in 2023.

item.title: James Gakara: Family of Nakuru Doctor's Wife Deny Claims She Wanted to Travel Abroad, Leave Kids Alo
item.description: According to Roseline Odhiambo, an elder sister to Nakuru doctor's wife, the mother of two was not planning to travel abroadShe was responding to reports that James Gakara killed his children over an argument with his wife over her desire to travel abroadRoseline said the doctor and his wife were on good terms and were in constant communication on the day he allegedly murdered his kidsThe family of the Nakuru doctor's wife have denied reports that the woman was planning to travel abroad and leave her family by themselves.

item.title: Ubi Franklin Shares Traumatic Experience As He Celebrates Daughters Birthday
item.description: The CEO of Made Men Music Group (MMMG), Ubi Franklin, who is the ex-husband of popular Nollywood actress, Lilian Esoro, has taken to social media to celebrate his daughter on her 4th birthday. The talent manager via his Instagram page stated that despite the many struggles he’d faced, he tries his best to be one of the best fathers out there. He added that he weathered storms that came with being with her and trusted God and time to give him the best way to deal with traumatic experiences.

item.title: US Rapper Soulja Boy Insults Wizkid's Mother Over 2010 Tweet
item.description: American rapper and record producer, DeAndre Cortez Way, known professionally as Soulja Boy, has slammed sensational music star, Wizkid over a derogatory tweet he made in 2010. The American rapper quoted an old tweet from Wizkid and insulted his mother in the process. The tweet made on the 12th of May, 2010 reads; “I swear soulja boy is wack!..jeeeezzzzz!” Responding, Soulja boy wrote: “Ya mama Wack. Shut ya bitch ass up”

item.title: How My Mentality Changed As A Single Parent
item.description: Sophia Momodu, the first baby mama of Nigerian award-winning singer, David Adeleke, popularly known as Davido, has recounted the night her mentality changed as a single parent. Naija News reports that Sophia, in a post via her Snapchat account on Friday, revealed today makes it exactly one year since she felt like her whole life was crumbling following her daughter’s ill health. Davido’s baby mama said she reached out to many people, including Nollywood actress cum disk jokey, Dorcas Fapson, before Imade was rushed to hospital and her family members and more friends came to join them.

item.title: Is Tig Notaro Married? The Comedian Has Had Her Love Life on Display
item.description: Tig Notaro built her comedy career out of a personal tragedy. Is the comedian married? Who is her partner? It's not often that one can build a comedy career out of a horrifying medical diagnosis, but Tig Notaro isn't like most comedians. Though she had a respectable comedy career being featured in shows like The Office, her career post–viral internet fame saw her guest-star in shows like Transparent and Bob's Burgers.

item.title: Mwanawe Didier Drogba afuata nyayo za babake, asajiliwa na klabu kubwa Ufaransa
item.description: - Mwanawe mchezaji maarufu kutoka Ivory Coast, Didier Drogba, Isaac Drogba ameonekana kufuata nyayo za babake katika soka - Isaac mwenye umri wa miaka 17 alikuwa katika shule ya soka ya Chelsea kabla ya kuondoka kujiunga na klabu maarufu Ufaransa Waswahili husema kuwa mtoto wa nyoka ni nyokana bila shaka ni methali inayostahili kwa Didier Drogba na mwanawe Isaac Drogba. Isaac amefuata nyayo za babake, na sasa ni mwanasoka anayetarajiwa kuwika katika ulimwengu wa ucheza soka.

No other portable gaming system has been so popular, and people of all ages have come to love it. item.title: Actress Bukky Wrights biography: Age, children, husband, net worth, movies
item.description: Bukky Wright is a veteran Nigerian actress, businesswoman, and politician. She is famous for starring in numerous Nollywood movies, including The Narrow Path, Gidi Blues, and Pure Honey. Bukky Wright ventured into the Nigerian film industry in 1996 and has since become a big name, appearing in numerous films. She is also into business and owns a clothing line and spa. In 2014, she vied for a political seat. Here is a look at her career and personal life.

item.title: Ondo Govt Opens Up On Reports Of Governor's Sickness
item.description: The Ondo State government has denied reports claiming Governor Rotimi Akeredolu is incapacitated. The state government made the clarification in a statement by the Commissioner for Information and Orientation, Bamidele Ademola-Olateju. The statement added that contrary to reports in some quarters, the Ondo State cabinet is not divided and instructions on governance are still coming from Governor Akeredolu. The Commissioner urged members of the public to disregard reports claiming Akeredolu is incapacitated, adding that such reports are the handiwork of unscrupulous persons trying to mislead unsuspecting members of the public.

item.title: JAMB to introduce mock exam for 2017 UTME candidates
item.description: The Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB) has announced that there will be a mock examination before the conduct of the 2017 Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME). The exam board made the statement following the announcement of its plans to begin sale of forms for the 2017 UTME on March 20. Ishaq Oloyede, the registrar of JAMB, in a statement released on Monday, March 13, noted that the mock examination would be held in all accredited Computer Based Test (CBT) centres to prepare and familiarise interested candidates with the CBT environment.

item.title: NDLEA Cracks Down On Drug Ring, Nabs 10, Seizes N10 Billion Worth Of Heroin
item.description: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) revealed that its officers intercepted the largest-ever heroin consignment brought into the country by a syndicate with operations in three different continents. Naija News understands that during a comprehensive nine-day operation, operatives apprehended 10 suspects, imposed blocks on 109 bank accounts, and confiscated N119 million, in addition to sealing properties, including hotels and mansions, located in the Ago Palace Way area of Lagos, as per the announcement.

item.title: IPOB: I Am Ready To Stand Surety For Nnamdi Kanu Again
item.description: Senate Minority Leader, Senator Enyinnaya Abaribe, has stated that he does regret standing surety for the embattled leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, Nnamdi Kanu. Naija News recall that Abaribe and two other individuals had in 2017 stood surety for Nnamdi Kanu before he was granted bail. The IPOB leader later jumped bail after security operatives attacked him home in Abuja State. Kanu, who was rearrested in Kenya, is currently facing charges bordering on terrorism, treason, incitement and many others.

item.title: Petrol Price Set To Crash In Nigeria
item.description: The Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Olayemi Cardoso, has projected a fall in the pump price of petrol in Nigeria. The CBN boss, who spoke on Wednesday in Lagos during the launch of the Nigerian Economic Summit Group (NESG) 2024 Macroeconomic Outlook Report, based the projection on the coming onboard of refineries in the country. Naija News reports that while Dangote Refinery has already commenced production, the Port Harcourt Refinery is expected to begin production soon as well.

item.title: Where Was 'White Noise' Filmed? Life Is Imitating Art a Little Too Closely
item.description: 'White Noise' depicts in airborne toxic event in Ohio, and following an actual train derailment in the state, many want to know more about the movie. Source: NetflixThe derailment of a train in East Palestine, Ohio, has devastated the community and may lead to lingering health problems for many of its residents. As many around the country follow the details of the derailment, and of the toxic chemicals that had to be burned off in its aftermath, some are noticing eerie parallels to Netflix's Adam Driver–led film White Noise, which hit the streamer at the very end of 2022.

item.title: 16 south-west groups declare support for IPOB, Kanu
item.description: Sixteen different groups with bases in the south-western part of Nigeria have backed the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) as the latter plans a massive protest for Friday, September 19, 2016 to call attention to the continued detention of their leader, Nnamdi Kanu. The groups are fusing under the aegis of Centre for Human Rights and Social Justice (CHRSJ) and have said they are throwing their weights behind the open protest.

item.title: Best prayers to break ungodly soul ties
item.description: Can soul ties be broken? Nothing breaks deeper into our hearts than continually losing in the warfare against evil and earthly obsessions. Luckily, we have an assurance of victory in divine interventions even as we wrestle against the evil one. Spiritual writings recommend constant supplication as the only sure way of breaking free from the bondage of sin. We can only count on prayers to break ungodly soul ties. The Almighty calls us to pray lest we fall short of His will continually.

item.title: Mtangazaji wa Citizen awasisimua wengi katika ujumbe wake wa mapenzi kwa mkewe
item.description: Ni vigumu kujua yale wanawake hupenda kufanyiwa na wanawaume, lakini mtangazaji wa runinga ya Citizen ameamua kuwapa wanaume maneno matamu ya kuwaambia wapenzi wao Habari Nyingine: Mbinu 6 za kushangaza ambazo wanawake wakenya hutumia ili kuwanyima wanaume NGONO Mtangazaji wa runinga ya Citizen Mike Njenga ana kila sababu ya kujivunia kwa kumpa mkewe furaha tele kwa njia ya ujumbe. Siku ya wapendanao (Valentine) imekaribia, na iko siku chache tu baada ya mkewe Mike, Phoebe Wanjiku kusherehekea siku yake ya kuzaliwa, Februari 8.

item.title: IPOB Cant Speak For Igbo People Gov Umahi
item.description: Governor David Umahi of Ebonyi State has noted that the Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, can’t speak for the people of South-East. The Chairman of the South-East Governors Forum during a visit to Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike, claimed that can’t represent the interest of the Ndigbo. Umahi said, “We, Ndigbo, we do not support criminalities. Do not buy into any criminal that is from our side. I find it very funny when somebody is going to be claiming that part of Benue State must descend into his territory and part of Rivers State must descend into his territory.

item.title: FG Bans Exportation Of Cooking Gas
item.description: The federal government of Nigeria has banned the exportation of cooking gas as part of efforts to beat down the price within the country and make the product available. This was made known on Thursday by the Minister of State, Petroleum Resources, Ekperikpe Ekpo. Speaking at a stakeholders workshop in Abuja with the theme, “Harnessing Nigeria’s Proven Gas Reserves for Economic Growth and Development,” Ekpo explained that once there is a stoppage of the export of locally produced domestic gas, there will be more volume for the domestic market which will automatically reduce the price of the product.

item.title: Kenya's Harambee Stars Versus Togo, Biggest Winning Odds in the World
item.description: The 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers comes to an end today, Monday, March 29, with Kenya versus Togo pencilled for 7pm. Mozzart Bet offers the biggest odds in the world for a Kenyan victory on this match and many other top fixtures today. Harambee Stars of Kenya play Togo in Lome tonight in Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) Group G dead rubber. With both teams having been eliminated from the running of a place to the coveted continental showpiece slated for Cameroon, the fixture will merely serve to complete tournament formalities for nothing is at stake.

item.title: Lagos State Assembly Disqualifies 17 Sanwo-Olu Commissioner Nominees
item.description: The Lagos State House of Assembly on Wednesday disqualified 17 of the commissioner nominees out of the 39 sent to it for screening by Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu. Naija News gathered 22 Commissioner Nominees were however confirmed by the lawmakers. This follows the presentation before the House by Hon. Mojeed Fatai of the report of the 12-man ad hoc committee on the screening of the Governor’s commissioner nominees. Speaking after the decision of the lawmakers, the Speaker of the Lagos State House of Assembly, Mudashiru Obasa thanked the committee members and added that they will as legislators continue to diligently perform their oversight functions in the state.

item.title: What is PayPal Resolution Center and how to use it to get money back
item.description: What is the PayPal Resolution Center? It is a specially designed tool which provides a link between the customers and sellers as well as protection regarding purchasing various goods from all over the world. The modern world offers a lot of opportunities for making different kinds of transactions. However, buyers often face unscrupulous sellers whose goods are of lower quality, have nothing in common with the items described in the shop’s catalogue or that are not delivered.

item.title: Details Of FBI's Meeting With Inspector-General Of Police Over Abba Kyari Revealed
item.description: Operatives of the Federal Bureau of Investigation on Friday met with the Inspector-General of Police, Usman Baba, in Abuja over the arrest warrant issued on Deputy Commissioner of Police, Abba Kyari. This is coming after the Nigerian super cop was linked in a fraud trial involving internet fraudster, Ramon Abbas, popularly known as Hushpuppi. item.title: Biafrans across Europe storm EU parliament (photos/video)
item.description: - Members of the Indigenous people of Biafra (IPOB) across Europe stormed Brussels the capital of Belgium (the headquarters of the European Union parliament) venue for the European Union summit to protest the illegal detention of Nnamdi Kanu. - The IPOB members came from Germany, Russia, Italy, Spain, Austria, Ukraine, Ireland, England, Sweden, Kosovo, Switzerland, Finland, Greece, Hungary and other countries in Europe. - Nnamdi Kanu has been in the confinement of the Department of State Security Service since October, 2015.

item.title: Ex-Minister, Bolaji Abdullahi Declares Senatorial Ambition
item.description: Former Minister of Youth and Sports and chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Bolaji Abdullahi, has announced his intention to contest the Kwara Central Senatorial seat. Speaking on Monday during a visit to the PDP secretariat in Ilorin, Kwara state capital, Abdullahi vowed to unseat Senator Yahaya Oloriegbe, who currently holds the seat. He stated that the All Progressives Congress (APC) has failed Nigerians and the incumbent lawmaker has not done anything tangible for the people of the senatorial district.

item.title: Sheik Gumi Visits Notorious Bandits In Zamfara Forests
item.description: A renowned Islamic Scholar, Sheikh Dr Abubakar Mahmoud Gumi, on Tuesday visited some bandits in the forests of Shinkafi and Gummi LGAs of Zamfara State. The Punch reports that Gumi’s visit to the camps was to spread the message of Islam and peace to the Fulani herdsmen and rid the country of kidnappings and banditry. The renowned scholar and his entourage were said to have first gone to the forest of Tubali and Makkai in Shinkafi LGA which were under the control of armed Fulani herdsmen.

item.title: 2023: There Is No Opposition Party In Rivers State
item.description: Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State has said there is no opposition party in the South-South state. Wike said this on Thursday at the flag-off of the 11th flyover project at the Rumuola- Ikwerre Road-Rumuokwuta Roundabout in Obio Akpor Local Government Area of the state. Naija News reports that the commissioning of the flyover was done by former Governor of Cross River State, Donald Duke. The governor stated that all the political parties in the state have collapsed into the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and their leaders are joining the party in droves.

item.title: Gunmen Attack UNTH, Enugu, Kidnap Deputy Director, One Other
item.description: Hoodlums, on Tuesday morning, attacked the University of Nigeria Teaching Hospital, Ituku Ozalla, in Enugu State and abducted some persons, including a female deputy director. It was gathered that the gunmen also abducted a security man during the attack. According to the Daily Post, an SUV allegedly belonging to the abducted woman, a nurse, was seen abandoned, with bullet-perforated glass on the front passenger side. The platform quoted a source to have said the incident occurred at the same location where a medical doctor was abducted a few weeks ago.

item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari Saturday in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, said Nigeria will continue to pursue peace and progress in Africa, and other parts of the world, by consistently pushing for justice, fairness and inclusiveness in global affairs. In a sideline meeting with the Prime Minister of Palestine, Mohammad Shtayyeh, at the ongoing African Union meetings, President Buhari said the country remains unwavering in supporting democracy, development and good governance, particularly in ensuring the rights of individuals and institutions.

item.title: High Inflation Frustrating Nigerias Economic Recovery
item.description: The World Bank has said Nigeria may not recover from its economic problems until the Nigerian Government solve the high inflation rate in the country. item.title: Marie Curie - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Polish physicist and chemist who discovered two radioactive elements: radium and polonium. She became the first woman to win a Nobel Prize in 1903 when she won the award for physics. In 1911, she won the award again for chemistry. Before Fame She was born poor because her family gave up their property during the Polish national uprisings. Trivia She was the first female professor at the University of Paris, and the first person to win multiple Nobel Prizes.

item.title: More Troubles For Hushpuppi As He Is Denied Bail In The US
item.description: Ramon Abbas, popularly known as Hushpuppi has been denied bail in his ongoing suspected internet fraud trial in the United States. His lawyer, Gal Pissetzky who had vowed to prove his client’s innocence, applied for him to leave jail with an electronic tag and live with the uncle of a woman with whom he has a child, but US prosecutors opposed the bail application. Pissetzky told the judge in Chicago via a video link that his client can not jump bail because he is an international celebrity who wouldn’t want to ruin his reputation.

item.title: Napoli Coach Compares Osimhen To Cristiano Ronaldo
item.description: The manager of Napoli, Rudi Garcia who has coached Cristiano Ronaldo at Saudi Pro League club, Al Nassr, has compared the Portuguese football icon to Victor Osimhen. Osimhen who is just 24-year-old has been fantastic for Napoli especially last season in which he scored 26 goals and provided 5 assists in 32 league games. This performance did not only help Napoli to win the Scudetto for the first time in 33 years, it also earned him the league top scorer award and the best Serie A striker of the season award.

item.title: PDP Reveals How It Plans To Handle IPOB If Elected Into Power
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, has on Tuesday revealed how it plans to resolve the Biafra agitation led by the Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, and insecurity generally across the country, if elected into power in 2023. Debo Ologunagba, PDP’s National Publicity Secretary, stated that the PDP will carry every part of the country along and make sure everyone has a sense of belonging. Ologunagba said this in a chat with Daily Post.

item.title: President Talon Of Benin Republic Did Not Allow Me Sleep With My Wife In Detention
item.description: Yoruba Nation activist, Chief Sunday Adeyemo, popularly known as Sunday Igboho, has said he was granted total freedom during his detention in Benin Republic. He however stated that he was not allowed to sleep with his wife, Ropo Adeyemo, Naija News reports. Speaking in Yoruba Language in a viral video alongside the leader of Ilana Omo Oodua Worldwide, Prof Banji Akintoye and deputy leader of the group, Prof. Wale Adeniran, Sunday Igboho thanked President Patrice Talon for giving him maximum freedom.

item.title: Robert Christopher Riley - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American actor recognized for his role as Terrance Wall in the series Hit the Floor. He also played Mr. Handsome in the 2013 film Franny. He is also part of the TV series "Dynasty" released in 2022. Before Fame He attended LeHigh University and began his acting career in 2006. Trivia He appeared in a Broadway production of Cat On a Hot Tin Roof and in the film "Naked Singularity".

item.title: Seven Nigerian Banks, Others Battle Aiteo Over $2bn Loan
item.description: Seven Nigerian banks alongside Shell Plc, and Africa Finance Corporation have dragged Aiteo Eastern E&P Company to court over $2 billion borrowed to purchase an interest in Nigerian oil fields and facilities. According to two agreements dated September 2, 2014, Aiteo borrowed the sum to purchase oil facilities in the country including Shell’s OPL 29. The seven Nigerian banks include Ecobank Nigeria Limited, Fidelity Bank plc, First Bank of Nigeria Limited, Guaranty Trust Bank plc, Sterling Bank plc, Union Bank of Nigeria plc, and Zenith Bank plc.

item.title: Suga, aka Agust D, Sings About "Freedom of Expression" on "Haegum"
item.description: What is the meaning of "Haegum" by Agust D? The song has capitvated fans of BTS and beyond. Let's unpack its lyrical content and more. Source: Instagram/@agustd The world of K-Pop may have been disheartened when it was revealed in October 2022 that the members of BTS were taking on military service and thus going on hiatus from working as a group, but that didn't mean that the music stopped entirely.

item.title: The Nigerian Political Class Is Hard Of Hearing
item.description: Former Minister of Education, Oby Ezekwesili has stated that the political class in the country is hard of hearing Ezekwesili made the assertion amidst the economic crisis in the country, an effect of the hike in the pump price of fuel. Naija News recalls that the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) had increased the pump price of petrol to about N617 per litre. This is coming shortly after the petrol price was increased to over N500 per litre, following the removal of fuel subsidy.

item.title: Virgil van Dijk Is Unsure Of Remaining At Liverpool After Klopp's Exit
item.description: Liverpool captain, Virgil van Dijk is not sure of his future at the club as his manager, Jurgen Klopp is on the verge of leaving the side at the end of this season. Just like most Liverpool fans, Virgil van Dijk had said he was taken aback when coach Klopp suddenly decided that his time with the club was over with two seasons left on his contract. Klopp will exit the club this summer with a series of other officials of the club including development coach, Vitor Matos, as well as deputy managers Peter Krawietz and Pepijn Lijnders.

item.title: Wike Meets Jonah Jang, Useni Over PDP Crisis
item.description: Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State on Wednesday met with the former Governor of Plateau State, Jonah Jang and a chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Lt Gen Jeremiah Useni (rtd). The Rivers governor met behind closed doors with the two PDP chieftains at the private residence of the retired General Useni in Jos, the state capital. Naija News reports that Wike was in Plateau to resolve the crisis between Jang and Useni over the control of the party structure in the North Central state.

item.title: Will There Be a 'Big Shot' Season 3? Here's the Scoop
item.description: Will there be a 'Big Shot Season' 3? Fans of the Disney Plus series are hoping for a continuation. It looks like Disney Plus Series Big Shot has become a fan-favorite. The series highlights former college basketball coach Marvyn Korn (John Stamos) who loses his job due to his testy temper and is now humbled with a position as a private high school girls basketball team. Naturally, it’s two different worlds, and Marvyn takes some time to get acclimated before finding his stride.
